t = eval(input())
while t>0 :
 p = input()
 count = 0
 cost = 0
 i=0
 while i<len(p):
  if count == 6:
   count = 0
   i = i +1
   continue
  if p[i] == 'M':
   cost = cost + 3
  else:
   cost = cost + 4
  count = count +1
  i = i+1
 print(cost)
 t = t-1

t=int(input())
for _ in range(t):
 a=input()
 c=0
 m=0
 for i in range(len(a)):
  if c==6:
   c=0
   continue
  if a[i]=='M':
   m+=3
   c+=1
   continue
  if a[i]=='L':
   m+=4
   c+=1
   continue
 print(m)
